title: Royal Rajasthan Tour
description: Explore the royal heritage of Rajasthan with visits to Jaipur, Udaipur, Jodhpur, and Jaisalmer.
highlights: A royal journey through Rajasthan's cultural and historical landmarks.
itinerary:
Day 1: Jaipur - Arrival and sightseeing
Day 2: Udaipur - Lake Pichola boat ride
Day 3: Jodhpur - Explore Mehrangarh Fort
Day 4: Jaisalmer - Desert safari and camel ride
Day 5: Jaipur - Return journey
